title: Tour de France
description: The sport’s biggest Grand Tour, three weeks in July across France and beyond.

title: Giro d'Italia
description: Italy’s Grand Tour held in May, famed for steep climbs and tifosi passion.

title: Vuelta a España
description: Late-season Grand Tour across Spain with brutal climbs and decisive stages.

title: Paris–Roubaix
description: Monument classic over infamous cobbles, finishing in the Roubaix Velodrome.

title: Critérium du Dauphiné
description: Week-long stage race in June, key Tour de France warm-up in the Alps.

title: Il Lombardia
description: The ‘Race of the Falling Leaves’, autumn Monument with punchy climbs in Lombardy.

title: La Flèche Wallonne
description: Ardennes Classic decided on repeated ascents of the Mur de Huy.

title: Liège–Bastogne–Liège
description: Oldest Monument, challenging Ardennes course with relentless climbs.

title: Tour of Flanders
description: Belgian Monument featuring cobbled bergs and passionate crowds.

title: UCI Road World Championships
description: Annual worlds awarding the rainbow jersey in road race and time trial.

title: Olympic Games (Cycling)
description: Quadrennial road, track, MTB and BMX competitions under the Olympic banner.
